security.a: All data is stored on Supabase, a cloud database with enterprise-grade security. We use encryption for data at-rest and in-transit, plus Row Level Security to completely isolate each Chapter's data.

line.q: Do I have to use LINE?
line.a: No! Meetdup has a Web Portal accessible via any browser. However, using LINE integration provides additional benefits like notifications, RSVP, and AI Assistant through LINE Bot.

migration.q: Can I migrate data from Excel?
migration.a: Yes! We have a Bulk Import system that supports importing members directly from Excel. Our Support team will help verify data before import to ensure accuracy.

roi.a: Based on Pilot Chapters data, Admins save approximately 5+ hours/week. At ~500 THB/hour, that's 10,000+ THB/month savings - more than the Core Plan cost. ROI is positive from month one.

training.a: Not long! The interface is designed for ease of use. Most Admins can start using it within 30 minutes. We also have Video Tutorials and Thai Support Team available.

cancel.q: Can I cancel if not satisfied?
cancel.a: Yes! You can cancel anytime with no long-term contracts. We also offer a 30-day Money-back Guarantee - full refund if not satisfied.
